info.description: This is the api for Joinself restful client.
info.title: Joinself restful-client API

post.description: Creates a new account and sends a request for public information. You must be authenticated as an admin.

delete.description: Deletes an existing account and sends a request for public information and avoids incoming comms from that account. You must be authenticated as an admin.

parameters.description: Username of the account to delete
parameters.name: username

404.description: Not found - The requested resource does not exist, or you don't have permissions to access it

put.description: Changes the password for the current user. You must be authenticated.
put.summary: Changes the password for the current user.

parameters.description: Username of the account to change the password
parameters.name: username

400.description: Bad request - The provided body is not valid

404.description: Not found - The requested resource does not exist, or you don't have permissions to access it

500.description: Internal error - There was a problem with your request

get.description: Retrieves and lists all the configured apps for the restful client. You must be authenticated as an admin.

404.description: Not found - The requested resource does not exist, or you don't have permissions to access it

post.description: Creates a new app with the given parameters. You must be authenticated as an admin.

parameters.description: Details of the new app to create
parameters.name: request

400.description: Bad request - The provided body is not valid

404.description: Not found - The requested resource does not exist, or you don't have permissions to access it

500.description: Internal error - There was a problem with your request

get.description: List connections matching the specified filters.

post.description: Creates a new connection and sends a request for public information.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of facts using the provided app_id, connection_id, and other optional filters. The results can be paginated using page and per_page parameters.

parameters.description: Page number for the results pagination
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Filter by source of the fact
parameters.name: source

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of facts

404.description: The requested resource could not be found or you don't have permission to access it

500.description: There was a problem with your request. Please try again

post.description: This endpoint issues a new fact to a specific connection using the provided app_id, connection_id and the request body.
post.summary: Issue a new fact to a connection

parameters.description: Body containing the details of the fact to be issued
parameters.name: request

400.description: Invalid input - the provided body is not valid

404.description: Not found - the requested resource does not exist, or you don't have permissions to access it

500.description: Internal error - there was a problem with your request. Please try again

get.description: This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific fact using the provided app_id, connection_id and fact request id.

parameters.description: Unique Identifier for the Fact Request
parameters.name: id

404.description: The requested fact could not be found or you don't have permission to access it

delete.description: Deletes an existing fact for a specific connection identified by app_id, connection_id and the id of the fact to be deleted.

parameters.description: Unique Identifier for the Fact to be deleted
parameters.name: id

404.description: The requested resource does not exist, or you don't have permissions to access it

get.description: List conversation messages with a specific connection.

parameters.description: return elements since a message id
parameters.name: messages_since

post.description: Sends a message to the specified connection.

put.description: Sends an edited message to the specified connection.

post.description: Sends a system notification to the given connection

put.description: Updates the properties of an existing connection..

delete.description: Deletes an existing connection and sends a request for public information and avoids incoming comms from that connection.

post.description: Sends a request request to the specified self user.

get.description: Get request details by request request id.

delete.description: Deletes an existing app and sends a request for public information and avoids incoming comms from that app. You must be authenticated as an admin.

parameters.description: ID of the app to delete
parameters.name: id

404.description: Not found - The requested resource does not exist, or you don't have permissions to access it

get.description: check the service is up and running

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a temporary JWT token and refresh token for API interaction.

parameters.description: Authentication request body with your username and password, or a refresh token
parameters.name: request

200.description: Successfully authenticated, JWT token and Refresh JWT token are returned in response
